Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.7.10-18
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package prometheus-process-exporter for versions less than 0.7.10-18. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus-process-exporter is earlier than 0.7.10-18, affected by CVE-2022-21698
